title: Focus (IN) Conference
description:
Eagle Valley Church of Christ will be hosting the second Focus (IN) Conference on August 10, 2019. Registration and a light breakfast will begin at 9 AM. The conference will go from 10 AM to 3 PM, and a homemade lunch will be provided. The theme will be "Seeking God". We hope you will be able to attend!

[Go to the Focus (IN) Site for more information.](https://evchurchofchrist.org/Focus-IN)
